r.s: SELinux binding for PHP script language
r.d: This extension provides a set of interfaces to communicate between SELinux and PHP script language. It contains functions to get/set security context of processes and other objects, to get/set system booleans, to make a query for in-kernel security server and so on.
r.n: - missing libselinux in link command - The selinux_deny_unknown() was added - PHP 7 compatibility (Remi) - fix build woth libselinux 2.0 (RHEL-6)
